name: Super Mario Bros. Deluxe
synopsis: This souped-up version of the all-time classic was a big hit on Game Boyâ„¢ Color. Super Mario Bros. Deluxe features all 32 original levels from the 1985 classic, plus a whole lot more! In Challenge mode, revisit classic levels and collect special red coins and Yoshi eggs to beat the high score. Or race against a familiar foe through eight special courses in You Vs Boo mode! There are even challenging secret levels to be discovered, for a true test of your Super Mario Bros. skills!
